cause.description: every 14 minutes a blind retarted dolphin is orphaned due to a combination of tuna fishing, the aids epidemic and the conflict in Darfur. Help bring this important problem into the light of day and stop allowing the goverment to hide one of the most important issues of our day... plus they're really cute.
cause.mission: do something with a porpoise, raise awareness of these lonely, mentally handicapped, visualy incapacitated adorable creatures
cause.name: blind-retarded orphan dolphin awareness
